name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell
description: This script will install "Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell" Gog edition with support for modern resolution.
notes:
During install please let all options by default.

This script uses different projects:
dgvoodoo2: http://www.dege.freeweb.hu/
ThirteenAG: https://thirteenag.github.io/wfp#sc
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Splinter Cell/system/"; mv dgVoodoo.conf dgVoodoo_original.conf; cd scripts; mv modupdater.asi modupdater.asi.off;

content:
files:
- scg: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- dgv: http://dege.freeweb.hu/dgVoodoo2/dgVoodoo2_55_4_1.zip
- scws: https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/download/sc/SplinterCell.WidescreenFix.zip
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Splinter Cell/system/SplinterCell.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_47
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing...
    executable: scg
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Splinter Cell/
    file: scws
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Splinter Cell/system
    file: dgv
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Splinter Cell/system/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Splinter Cell/system/MS/D3D8.dll
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: d3d8
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: msacm32
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: msvfw32
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Splinter Cell/system/"; mv dgVoodoo.conf
      dgVoodoo_original.conf; cd scripts; mv modupdater.asi modupdater.asi.off;
- write_config:
    data:
      DirectX:
        AppControlledScreenMode: false
        DisableAltEnterToToggleScreenMode: false
        ForceVerticalSync: true
        Resolution: unforced
        VRAM: 256
        dgVoodooWatermark: false
      General:
        CaptureMouse: false
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Splinter Cell/system/dgVoodoo.conf
wine:
  dxvk: true
